results.title: Metformin treatment reduces inflammation, dysmyelination and disease severity in a mouse model of multiple sclerosis, experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis.
results.text_hl: We found that acute @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment improved functional outcomes, concomitant with reduced microglia numbers and decreased @<m>DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@dysmyelination@@@.

results.title: Pontine and bilateral cerebellar lesion in osmotic demyelination syndrome associated with uncontrolled type II diabetes mellitus: a case report
results.text_hl: With a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@ODS@@@ with poorly controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, he was treated with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and supportive measures following which his symptoms subsided gradually.

results.title: Metformin Therapy Attenuates Pro-inflammatory Microglia by Inhibiting NF-kappaB in Cuprizone Demyelinating Mouse Model of Multiple Sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Evaluation of myelin by @CHEMICAL_Luxol_Fast_Blue_MBS @CHEMICAL_MESH:C018588 @@@luxol fast blue@@@ staining revealed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (@CHEMICAL_Cuprizone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003471 @@@CPZ@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Methionine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008715 @@@Met@@@) diminished @<m>DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@demyelination@@@, in comparison to @CHEMICAL_Cuprizone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003471 @@@CPZ@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Metformin Restores CNS Remyelination Capacity by Rejuvenating Aged Stem Cells
results.text_hl: Fasting or treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can reverse these changes and restore the regenerative capacity of aged OPCs, improving remyelination in aged animals following focal @<m>DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@demyelination@@@.

results.title: Adenosine 5'-triphosphate (ATP) inhibits schwann cell demyelination during Wallerian degeneration.
results.text_hl: We found that extracellular @CHEMICAL_Adenosine_Triphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000255 @@@ATP@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@myelin fragmentation@@@ and axonal degradation during @DISEASE_Wallerian_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D014855 @@@WD@@@. Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Chlorpromazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002746 @@@chlorpromazine@@@, lysosomal exocytosis antagonists blocked the effect of @CHEMICAL_Adenosine_Triphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000255 @@@ATP@@@ on the inhibition of @<m>DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@demyelination@@@.

results.title: Oligoprotective effect of metformin through the AMPK-dependent on restoration of mitochondrial hemostasis in the cuprizone-induced multiple sclerosis model.
results.text_hl: In the current study, we investigated the possible protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on oxidative stress and mitochondrial function by activating the AMPK pathway in the @CHEMICAL_Cuprizone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003471 @@@cuprizone@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@demyelination@@@.
